Pre-Game Insights: Greece have won two of their last three games in this fixture after winning just one of their previous five.
Finland are without a clean sheet in their last five games across all competitions.
Greece have lost just one of their last five home matches and will head into the weekend clash as favorites.
Finland are on a run of back-to-back winless outings and have won just one of their last four matches.
They are without a win in their last three away matches and could see defeat here.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greece will face Finland at the Georgios Karaiskakis on Saturday in the opening game of their 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaign.
The two teams last faced off in an European Championship qualifying clash back in November 2019 which the hosts won 2-1.
Finland participated in the European Championship playoffs but were knocked out in the semifinals by Wales.
Trending: Greece vs Finland Head-to-Head and Key Numbers.
There have been 18 meetings between Greece and Finland. The hosts have won half of those games while the visitors have won six times.
Greece's latest result ended a run of back-to-back defeats and they will be looking to build on that this Saturday.
